title: Keycloak 25.0.6 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   BUGS   * Network response was not OK. saml  * Re-enabling a temporarily locked user (brute-force) deletes all user    properties and attributes admin/ui  * Remember Me with External Infinispan is not works properly infinispan  * WebAuthn Flows Broken in login.v2 login/ui  * Dots are not allowed in the path in Hostname v2 dist/quarkus  * KeyCloak Admin Client uses non-standard `@NoCache` annotation which is an    issue for Quarkus admin/client-java  * Realm import fails when client configures default_acr values import-export  * Increased DB activity due to changes in    LDAPStorageManager.searchForUserByUserAttributeStream ldap  * CVE-2024-8883 Vulnerable Redirect URI Validation Results in Open Redirect  * CVE-2024-8698 Improper Verification of SAML Responses Leading to Privilege    Escalation in Keycloak
